html:
12.13.19  9:09 pm   Do you like sushi

     i have yet to even be able to penetrate its robust exterior

12.13.19  9:00 pm   Bill I just made porridge for my breakfast but I heated it for the wrong amount of time, just like in your airport video. What do I do?

     heat it more, or cool it, accordingly

12.13.19  8:57 pm   what is the best water

     wet

12.13.19  8:48 pm   are CAPS letters overrated?

     no. under rated probably

12.13.19  8:03 pm   how to count inclusively

     count everything. leave no thing un counted

12.13.19  7:29 pm   How do you get from Argentina to Bulgaria?

     i would suggest some type of airline or planar vehicle

12.13.19  7:28 pm   Hallo Bill. What should I do with 40 bucks. I honestly don't know. Please help...

     put it in the bank. you will eventually need it

12.13.19  7:25 pm   Bill can you give me 25 words that make a sentence without using A thank you for your input.

     i will try, but i don't know if it will be even remotely possible without severely bending the rules of every known universe in existence

12.13.19  6:34 pm   What languages you like the way they sound but dont actually understand them? 

     goats

12.13.19  6:25 pm   what is the perfect length for a song?

     2:57

12.13.19  6:10 pm   hey whats the name of this game? How do you play it, and how long does it take

     scientists are trying to figure out

12.13.19  5:27 pm   Are you scared of elevators? 

     no, but now that you mention it i just became scared of them

12.13.19  4:55 pm   favourite aquatic reptile

     turtle

      and why?

      when you tally up their strengths and weaknesses, they have more strengths than weaknesses

12.13.19  4:52 pm   can you make big text

     yes, #godbless

12.13.19  4:40 pm   Have you ever invented a language?

     yes

      are you a conlanger?

     i was when i was a kid, then i became disillusioned with the idea, as i realized that everything i love about languages had to have been developed over centuries of real live use cases

12.13.19  4:14 pm   given the absurdist nature of your work, i'd think that any artistic advice you could give would be equally surreal but seeing your answers to these questions, they seem quintessential and applicable to even the most banal music. do you think you could make such music if you tried?

     given that describing music is almost entirely impossible, i have no idea what such music you mean

12.13.19  4:14 pm   How do you feel about the duck?

     brilliant. dynamic, curvaceous yet durable

12.13.19  4:08 pm   how's the view from the top of the water tower?

     pretty good, the water tower looks enormous from here

12.13.19  4:02 pm   you are a good human. a good example of humanity. exploring your website feels like making a friend 😎👍

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.13.19  3:53 pm   How long did it take you to become so talented?

     my talents have been gradually developing for my entire life

12.13.19  3:31 pm   say something interesting

     that's preposterous. who do you think i am

12.13.19  3:07 pm   thoughts on fun?

     boring

12.13.19  3:07 pm   have you ever guzzled water from a hot spring in Fiji

     no but that sounds useful

12.13.19  2:43 pm   What do you think is the greatest invention?

     language

12.13.19  2:28 pm   what inspired you to do music

     the music itself

12.13.19  1:52 pm   Please explain procrastination

     you don't want to do something you are supposed to, so you find the longest word possible to describe the avoidance process

12.13.19  1:47 pm   How is a bagel differemt from a donut

     much much less sugar

12.13.19  1:47 pm   Are you well-versed in all kinds of instruments

     many kinds, but not all of them

12.13.19  1:43 pm   The Earth is slowly losing it's influence on the orbit of the moon. Eventually, the moon will be sort of 'sling-shotted' into the deep reaches of space.

Assuming that this is fact, what if, theoretically, when the moon blasts off into space after Earth loses gravitational influence on it, what if the trajectory is heading straight towards a theoretical intelligent alien race? What if they saw the flag(s) that wave on it's surface? What would their questions be as something that looks to be a giant moon-sized weapon is hurdling at their planet, as they are waiting for their doom?

Idk, but it's fun to think about.

     the flags are probably not in any waveable condition anymore

12.13.19  1:13 pm   How many times do you watch a video all the way through once it's finished to make sure it's *really* finished?

     maybe 3 or 4. different types of watches. full broad non-stop "lean back" watch (as if i am the casual first time viewer). then there is pause a lot check every corner of the screen for glitches and mistakes. then there is a deep spell-check watch. of course this is not including all the times where i did find mistakes, because that means it actually wasn't done

      And is that why you never listen to your songs once you've released them? Because you've already listened a billion times? 

     partially, but also it can be terrifying because what if it's bad. what then. everyone's already heard it

12.13.19  12:57 pm   what are your thoughts on velcro?

     it's good but i hate it

12.13.19  12:54 pm   If you could live in any decade before 1980 what would it be?

     1970

12.13.19  12:41 pm   you are very clever and it annoys me. 

     you are not alone. i annoy myself also

12.13.19  12:25 pm   In "Wild frolicking adventures of informational education", you state that at the South Pole, they have many punishments there. What was the punishment they did on you specifically?

     like the electric chair, but with no chair

12.13.19  12:24 pm   when have it is the time are tomorrow?

     pretty soon

12.13.19  12:13 pm   are you in a new long long long journey?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.13.19  12:06 pm   I don't remember the question I asked you so now I can't find the answer. How do I remember what I once knew?

     it's right here

12.13.19  11:47 am   how long does the day go on

     i am testing its limits right now

12.13.19  11:34 am   can you make an acronym for 'qwerty'?

     quickly, without even really trying yet

12.13.19  11:20 am   pretty sure youre slightly insane and i think thats very cool of you

     whatever it takes, to get the job done

12.13.19  11:03 am   what is the best way to steal a pencil?

     got to use magnets

12.13.19  10:55 am   Do you go to concerts?

     occasionally, for research purposes

      Have you been reconised when you did?

     no, i am sneaky

12.13.19  10:50 am   Why do you exist, why am I here you sack of shit?

     existing is useful. one of the most useful techniques available

12.13.19  10:35 am   i've been feeling like shit for the past 11 months and i don't know how i can fix all of it. what is the best thing i can do

     tell me a little bit more information

12.13.19  10:26 am   Could you find out if this world is real?

     i already know it is, but i will check again for you. yes it is

12.13.19  10:25 am   Have you ever noticed how impractical the English language truly is?

     no

      So many words look exactly the same yet mean completely different things, or maybe only slightly different things, and sometimes the same word can both mean the plural and the singular. No language is 'easy' to learn per se, but some are easier to learn than others, this one is probably on the harder side of things.

     i'm not so sure about that

      The problem is, this language may be impractical as all hell, but it's also the only language that can describe certain things, that other languages just can't do or say, that the idea alone, that combination of meanings, was completely out of their realm of possibility, and that is fascinating.

How do you feel about languages?

     very good

      It doesn't have to be about this specific topic, if you don't want to.

12.13.19  9:36 am   will you ever have a consistent uploading schedule?

     i did during the later half of 2018, i did during 2015 and 2014, and i certainly will again. it usually happens as soon as i reach a breaking point

12.13.19  9:32 am   Hi what are you up to now?

     trying to amount to something

12.13.19  9:22 am   Can you provide the lyrics to your video entitled, "No"? Thaks in advance.

     i think it's on the lyrics page of this website

12.13.19  9:06 am   Do you read a lot of books?

     no
